benchmark_details.name: MuChoMusic: Evaluating Music Understanding in Multimodal Audio-Language Models
benchmark_details.overview: MuChoMusic comprises 1,187 multiple-choice questions validated by human annotators, focusing on music understanding in multimodal language models that process audio and language.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate music understanding capabilities in Audio LLMs through a standardized multiple-choice format.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The benchmark may not fully represent all genres and cultural contexts of music.

methods: Evaluation of performance through accuracy and instruction-following rate
methodology.calculation: Percentage of correctly answered questions and generated answers that correspond to given options.
methodology.interpretation: A higher accuracy indicates better music understanding, while IFR measures the appropriateness of the responses generated by models.
methodology.validation: Questions validated through human annotators before final inclusion.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: Sourced a variety of musical backgrounds but acknowledge challenges in representation.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Participants were informed and their privacy was safeguarded; no personal data was collected.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License (CC BY 4.0).
ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Participants were fully informed about the research objectives and provided consent.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.compliance_with_regulations: Complied with ethical research guidelines as approved by the Queen Mary Ethics of Research Committee.
